Text: it works before uploading it here i played it on my Laptop and comp 32i 64 win 7

If you have a problem that you can not kill alpha CHEP (final boss) lower graphics settings to minimum and reduce the image on a monitor at 800/600, and when you kill him go back to the normal settings.

If it's a hassle I will now upload crack and use it only at the end of the game to kill the alpha CHEP and just so you know you will not lose your saved game when you put the crack that I give you
